mapper.select: SELECT id, createdAt, updatedAt, name, code, description, isEnabled, deleted FROM sys_role WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT id, createdAt, updatedAt, name, code, description, isEnabled, deleted FROM sys_role WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY createdAt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role (createdAt, updatedAt, name, code, description, isEnabled, deleted) VALUES (NOW(), NOW(), #{name}, #{code}, #{description}, #{isEnabled}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET deleted = 1, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
